gameDetails.name: Crossing Oceans: Upgrade Kit for Transatlantic
gameDetails.description:
Crossing Oceans: Upgrade Kit for Transatlantic contains most of what you need to play the 2022 game Crossing Oceans. To complete the game, you will need these components from the 2017 game Transatlantic:

• All wooden pieces: captains, houses, coal
• Banknotes (i.e., the paper money)
